item.title: UN Security Council: Differences over Haiti
item.author: Elvira_Ineza
item.description: The UN Security Council finally establishes sanctions regime on Haiti to punish actors threatening peace and security.

item.title: UNICEF and WHO: Alarm over cholera outbreaks
item.author: Elvira_Ineza
item.description: As Cholera outbreak spreads across 29 countries, UNICEF calls for 27.5 million to combat disease.
